nodes.text: Ginger ale was a beverage and a type of ale. When Darth Vader was recovering in a Medcenter due to an accident that accured on the Rebel cruiser Tantive IV in 0 BBY, he ordered a 2-1B surgical droid to bring him ginger ale.
Ginger ale was first mentioned in the LEGO Star Wars short film Bombad Bounty. It is a reference to a soft drink with the same name in the real world.
